org.digijava.module.aim.util

Class IndicatorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.module.aim.util.IndicatorUtil

  • public class IndicatorUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Indicator utilities. Methods for manipulating AmpIndicator, AmpIndicatorValue, IndicatorConnection and all its subclasses. Also indicator relation management methods can be found here.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IndicatorUtil.IndicatorNameComparator
      Compares AmpIndicator objects by 'name' property
      static class  IndicatorUtil.IndThemeBeanComparatorByIndciatorName
      Compares IndicatorThemeBean by their indicator's name
      static class  IndicatorUtil.IndThemeIndciatorNameComparator
      Compares IndicatorTheme objects by its indicators name property.

      • validateIndicatorName

        public static boolean validateIndicatorName(AmpIndicator indicator)
                                     throws DgException
        Searches database for AmpIndicator with given name. Returns true if such indicator exists otherwise returns false
        Parameters:
        indicator - object.
        Returns:
        true or false
        Throws:
        DgException - if anything goes wrong rollback is attempted.

      • deleteIndicator

        public static void deleteIndicator(java.lang.Long id)
                            throws DgException
        Removes AmpIndicator from db. Also Indicator values will be deleted because of AmpIndicator.hbm.xml mappings.
        Parameters:
        id - primary key of indicator
        Throws:
        DgException

      • getIndicators

        public static java.util.Set<IndicatorTheme> getIndicators(AmpTheme prog,
                                                          boolean childrenToo)
                                                   throws DgException
        Recursively all indicators of the theme object. If childrenToo parameter is true then all indicators assigned to all sub themes at all levels of the specified theme are also add to the results. If this parameter is false then only specified theme indicators are returned.
        Parameters:
        prog -
        childrenToo -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DgException

      • removeConnection

        public static IndicatorTheme removeConnection(java.lang.Long connectionId)
                                       throws DgException
        Removes connection bean dropping connection between indicator and program or activity. Indicator itself is unaffected but values for this connections will be deleted with connection bean.
        Parameters:
        conenctionId - id of the connection bean.
        Throws:
        DgException
